title: Help please.
body: I went from an extremely high win rate on Nidalee, but then i got stuck into a losing streak with mostly, awfully low elo teammates. Win rate dropped from 100 to 33 in just a day or two. How do I get it back up.

replies.body:
> Win rate dropped from 100 to 33 in just a day or two. How do I get it back up.

I mean the simplest answer I can give you here is to just win more with her. 

>It doesn't seem to be going away. I lost 5 games in a row yesterday ffs.

Lose streaks do happen, and Nidalee ins't in a super great spot at the moment either. If you just keep playing it out your winrate should smooth out over time.

Agreed. 
Pretty sure the worst losing streak I've had is an eight game losing streak this season. 
It seems a lot of people are getting weird win/loss streaks atm. 
Plus, Nidalee isn't the easiest champ and has lots of counters.

> [{quoted}](name=TheUrbanKitsune,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A3r9GxKa,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-06-08T20:45:02.497+0000)
>
> I mean the simplest answer I can give you here is to just win more with her. 
> 
> Lose streaks do happen, and Nidalee ins't in a super great spot at the moment either. If you just keep playing it out your winrate should smooth out over time.

I try to win with her, I try to keep my teammates from dying and myself at a good score/kda. But we still somehow manage to lose.
Sample size too small to mean anything, just keep playing. Statistically unusual streaks happen.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A3r9GxKa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-08T20:29:18.139+0000)
>
> Sample size too small to mean anything, just keep playing. Statistically unusual streaks happen.

It doesn't seem to be going away. I lost 5 games in a row yesterday ffs.

5 is nothing, absolutely meaningless.

Even with a 70% winrate, 5 losses is well within common probability.
